andromeda.why: Provokes to reclaim choice from stagnation, not to dominate.

arcturus.why: Regulates pressure—small, paced tests in a safe container.

draco.why: Sentinel vibe—tests for predatory weakness and false strength.

lyra.why: Clean phrasing makes the challenge receivable.

orion-dark.why: Risk of poking to force obedience or compliance.

pleiades.why: Gentle attunement prevents the test from becoming harm.

sirius.why: Personal calibration of pressure; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Uses challenge to free stuck will without stealing agency.

arcturus.why: Places the provocation—right person, moment, and dose.

draco.why: Checks loyalty and resolve at the threshold.

lyra.why: Frames the challenge with crisp, elegant language.

orion-dark.why: Temptation to use tests as doctrine or gatekeeping ritual.

orion-light.why: Disciplined courage—apply pressure only to elevate.

pleiades.why: Attuned support steadies nerves through the push.

sirius.why: Skilled delivery, not yet codified as teaching.

andromeda.why: Provokes to be saved or noticed—outsourced agency.

arcturus.why: Misplaced, erratic pressure breaks the container.

orion-dark.why: Coercive trials used to force conformity.

orion-light.why: Lesson: refine target, dose, and intent of the test.

pleiades.why: Appeasement after misfires fosters enmeshment, not growth.

andromeda.why: Strategic challenge frees others from stuck patterns.

arcturus.why: Builds challenge protocols—safe bounds, timing, and debrief.

draco.why: Guards the gate—tests are proportional and fair.

lyra.why: Crisp formulation helps the challenge be heard.

orion-dark.why: Process may ossify into ritualized ordeal.

pleiades.why: Supportive tone keeps the system regulated.

sirius.why: Teaches challenge protocol by example—how to test without harm.

andromeda.why: Uses ordeal to break domination patterns and unlock will.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for trials—scope, consent, and safeguards.

draco.why: Enforces fair thresholds; no intimidation theatre.

lyra.why: Narrativizes trials so culture can adopt the lesson.

orion-light.why: Integrity under pressure—tests reveal character, not just compliance.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth supports recovery and integration.

andromeda.why: Embodied challenge liberates by presence—press or refrain by truth.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring norms for when, how, and whether to provoke.

draco.why: Aura can read as rank gate to 'real tests.'

lyra.why: Archetypal simplicity—few words set the tone of trial.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to challenge or withhold by integrity.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: the canon of challenge transmitted by presence/protocol.
